title: ShopLocal
description: Shop Local is a pet project and an early prototype of an ecommerce application. Consumers can search for goods locally and merchants can login and manage inventory and business information.

title: UCR Coin Laundry
description: Simple static site for a laundromat using a Bootstrap template that I converted to Jekyll. Teamed up with Juan Villagomez on this one.

title: CPS Uninterruptible Power
description: Static site using a Bootstrap template with Jekyll. Minimal scripting for form validation and some animation. This was done in collaboration with Juan Villagomez.

title: The Glass Guy
description: Only the best in glass installation servicing the Coachella Valley

title: Allyson Jeffredo's Site
description: The great Allyson Jeffredo is the content editor for this site. Go buy her book, hire her, check out her published work, or check out what she is up to by clicking below to visit her website.

title: Lotus 2 Salon
description: Static, informational site for a hair salon. Used a Bootstrap 3 template and converted it to Jekyll.
